QueryDefinition.Query: select a.patid as person_id, a.epistart as condition_start_date, a.epiend as condition_end_date, ICD as condition_source_value, replace(replace(a.ICD,'-',''),'.','') source_value, case when d_order=1 then 38000184 when d_order=2 then 38000185 when d_order=3 then 38000186 when d_order=4 then 38000187 when d_order=5 then 38000188 when d_order=6 then 38000189 when d_order=7 then 38000190 when d_order=8 then 38000191 when d_order=9 then 38000192 when d_order=10 then 38000193 when d_order=11 then 38000194 when d_order=12 then 38000195 when d_order=13 then 38000196 when d_order=14 then 38000197 when d_order=15 then 38000198 when d_order=16 then 44818709 when d_order=17 then 44818710 when d_order=18 then 44818711 when d_order=19 then 44818712 else 44818713 end as condition_type_concept_id, b.spno as visit_occurrence_id, b.pconsult, ';' + b.pconsult ProviderIdKey from HES_diagnosis_epi a JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.PERSON_ID join hes_episodes b on a.patid=b.patid and a.epikey=b.epikey where a.epistart is not null
